job_details.Functieomschrijving:
You will work in a team of highly skilled engineers, to:
     * Achieve uptime >99.99%.
     * Manage and expand the physical servers, OS's and networks in multiple datacenters.
     * Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation.
     * Operate and improve our automation tooling.
     * Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation schedule.
     * Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company up to and including the base OS layer and kubernetes.
     * Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company to bring our products to a large number of corporate customers worldwide., * A fair salary.
     * A yearly bonus based on yours and the company's performance.
     * 25 days of holiday leave
     * Hybrid working, travel allowance and compensation for your internet costs at home.
     * Holiday allowance and participation in a solid pension plan.
     * Working in a fast-growing company with a motivated international team with over 35 nationalities.
     * Having good equipment.
     * Having an influence on our products.
     * Working comfortably in a brand new office in Amsterdam with our company boat being only a stone's throw away.
     * Free quality lunches, snacks and drinks: whatever you fancy, our kitchen has it all!
     * Being able to participate in weekly bootcamp sessions or yoga classes.
     * Enjoying a weekly chair massage.
     * Chilled drinks on Friday.
     * Participating in our yearly week-long hackathon but also joining meet-ups, training courses and/or scientific conferences.
job_details.full_text:
Linux/Infra System Engineer

You will work in a team of highly skilled engineers, to:
     * Achieve uptime >99.99%.
     * Manage and expand the physical servers, OS's and networks in multiple datacenters.
     * Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation.
     * Operate and improve our automation tooling.
     * Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation schedule.
     * Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company up to and including the base OS layer and kubernetes.
     * Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company to bring our products to a large number of corporate customers worldwide., * A fair salary.
     * A yearly bonus based on yours and the company's performance.
     * 25 days of holiday leave
     * Hybrid working, travel allowance and compensation for your internet costs at home.
     * Holiday allowance and participation in a solid pension plan.
     * Working in a fast-growing company with a motivated international team with over 35 nationalities.
     * Having good equipment.
     * Having an influence on our products.
     * Working comfortably in a brand new office in Amsterdam with our company boat being only a stone's throw away.
     * Free quality lunches, snacks and drinks: whatever you fancy, our kitchen has it all!
     * Being able to participate in weekly bootcamp sessions or yoga classes.
     * Enjoying a weekly chair massage.
     * Chilled drinks on Friday.
     * Participating in our yearly week-long hackathon but also joining meet-ups, training courses and/or scientific conferences.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on Linux/Infra System Engineering, managing physical servers, OS, and networks, and operating automation tooling. It lacks any mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related tasks, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer profile.

phrases: Achieve uptime >99.99%
Manage and expand the physical servers, OS's and networks in multiple datacenters
Operate and improve our automation tooling
Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation schedule
Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company up to and including the base OS layer and kubernetes
Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company
job_tasks.justification: These phrases relate to managing and maintaining infrastructure, ensuring high availability, operating automation tools, and working with a DevOps mindset, which are core aspects of operations engineering, though not specifically MLOps in an AI context.

phrases: Provide a flexible infrastructure to the rest of the company up to and including the base OS layer and kubernetes
job_tasks.justification: While not traditional application development, providing and managing the underlying infrastructure, including Kubernetes, involves software development principles for system stability and scalability.

phrases: Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation
Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company to bring our products to a large number of corporate customers worldwide.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate a need to understand the company's technical landscape and how infrastructure supports product delivery to customers, aligning with business objectives.

technologies.justification: Kubernetes is a platform for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications, often used in MLOps pipelines.

phrases: Achieve uptime >99.99%
Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation
Provide a flexible infrastructure
soft_skills.justification: These phrases imply the need to solve complex infrastructure challenges to meet high availability targets and provide adaptable solutions.

phrases: You will work in a team of highly skilled engineers
Work with a DevOps mindset with other teams within the company
soft_skills.justification: The job requires working within a team and collaborating with other departments, highlighting communication and teamwork.

phrases: Understand a complex technical architecture with a high degree of customisation
Operate and improve our automation tooling
soft_skills.justification: The need to understand complex, customized architectures and continuously improve tooling suggests a requirement for learning and adapting.

phrases: Achieve uptime >99.99%
Manage and expand the physical servers, OS's and networks
Operate and improve our automation tooling
Provide a flexible infrastructure
Having an influence on our products
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on achieving high uptime, managing and expanding infrastructure, improving tooling, and influencing products suggests a need for initiative and ownership.
